long_description: Top-Tracks bolt permanently to the roofs of SUVs, camper shells and minivans to create a convenient and stylish platform for multipurpose roof racks. For load carrying flexibility, Top-Tracks allow Tracker II feet (sold separately) to be positioned anywhere along the length of the track. Heavy-duty, black anodized aluminum track is corrosion resistant for years of use. Tracker II feet, Tracker Kit and appropriate Load Bars (all sold separately) are necessary to build a complete roof rack system; locks are optional. Also compatible with Yakima Railriders.
short_description: Top-Tracks bolt permanently to the roofs of SUVs, camper shells and minivans to create a convenient and stylish platform for multipurpose roof racks.
